additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Aqua, Urea, Potassium Thioglycolate, Glycerin, Calcium Hydroxide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butane, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Ceteareth-20, Parfum, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Isobutane, Propane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Gluconate, Acrylates Copolymer, Limonene, Citronellol, BHT, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Propellant: Nitrogen.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: - Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal.- Keep out of reach of children. Pressurised dispenser. Do not pierce or burn even after use. protect from sunlight and do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50C. Do not spray near or on naked flame, heat or any incandescent material. No smoking. Use only as directed. Read and follow all precautions and directions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.- Suitable for use on the legs, arms, underarms & bikini line., Follow the directions for use indicated on the tube. Retain this outer packaging for full precautions. FAILURE TO FOLLOW DIRECTIONS FOR USE AND PRECAUTIONS MAY RESULT IN CHEMICAL BURNS. Designed for use on legs, arms, underarms & bikini line, but not suitable for use on the face, head, breast, perianal or genital areas or any other body parts. Do not use on scars, moles, spotty, broken, irritated or sunburnt skin, on skin which has been depilated in the last 72 HOURS or on skin which has suffered an adverse reaction to hair removal creams in the past.

description: Veet Spray On Hair Removal Cream works close to the root even on short hair, leaving your skin touchably smooth. The spray on method means you can easily cover hard to reach areas like the back of your leg, quickly and with no mess.
name: Sensitive Spray On Hair Removal Cream Aloe Vera & Vitamin E
